svg.title: CE-03: ROI Acceleration and Compound Benefits Timeline
svg.desc: Sophisticated timeline visualization showing accelerating returns from principle implementation, with compounding effect curves, milestone-based ROI jumps, and predictive modeling for long-term benefits with business case development focus.
svg.text: ROI Acceleration and Compound Benefits Timeline
Strategic investment analysis with accelerating returns, compound effect modeling, and predictive business case development
Executive presentation • Predictive analytics • Business case optimization

g.text: • Pilot Program: Start with 2-3 senior developers
📱 Mobile-Optimized • 💼 Executive Ready • 📊 Real-time Analytics • ♿ WCAG 2.1 AA Compliant
Business Case Generator: Strategic ROI modeling with 213% projected returns
